title: Group portrait of man, wearing eyeglasses and dark bow tie, standing with woman, wearing eyeglasses, light colored short sleeve wedding dress with sheer shoulders, striped skirt, corsage on left shoulder, light colored elbow length gloves, and bracelet on left wrist, holding small handbag in left hand, gathered in domestic interior with dark patterned sofa on right, leaf patterned curtains, and fireplace with figurine of woman walking dogs on mantle, possibly for 50th anniversary
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
